entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets changing to periods of rain or drizzle in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to periods of light snow in the evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:51 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
